meanings.definition: Having a protruding belly; overweight or obese.
meanings.sent1: The man's paunchier appearance made it clear he enjoyed his meals.
meanings.sent2: As he continued to eat unhealthy foods, he became paunchier.
meanings.sent3: Despite his efforts to hide it, his paunchier figure was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent4: His belly grew paunchier with each passing day, like a balloon slowly inflating.
meanings.sent5: The image of his paunchier silhouette lingered in her mind.

meanings.definition: To become more overweight or obese.
meanings.sent1: He knew he needed to exercise more to avoid becoming paunchier.
meanings.sent2: If he kept eating fast food every day, he would only get paunchier.
meanings.sent3: His goal for the new year was to not let himself get paunchier than he already was.
meanings.sent4: The scale showed he was getting paunchier, prompting him to change his habits.
meanings.sent5: Each unhealthy meal he ate made him feel like he was paunchier than before.
